authors.bio: Infinitbility is a tech blog created with the sole purpose of explaining complex tech in a simple and concise way thus creating value for budding developers out there.
authors.name: Infinitbility

authors.bio: Notebility is created as a platform to help, build and teach community of people who are willing to learn and grow. We aim to cover various IT Fields such as Design, Programming, Marketing and many more.
authors.name: Notebility

authors.bio: Here at Repairbility, we believe that the customer experience is the most important aspect of our business. Plain and simple, we're here for YOU. contact +91 9967814596
authors.name: Repairbility

group.title: Undefined variable timeMatches and etagMatches cakephp
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we figure out the solution of Undefined variable timeMatches and etagMatches cakephp.

group.title: App crashed immediately after install react native video or track player
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we figure out the solution of the conflict issues of video and track players.

group.title: React Native Font Family list
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we discuss about react native fonts, fonts list, custom fonts, and fonts ttf files.

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { AppRegistry, ScrollView, Text, StyleSheet} from 'react-native';

styles=StyleSheet.create({
    scroller: {
        flex: 1,
    }
});

export default class AndroidFonts extends Component{
  render (){
    return(
      <ScrollView style={styles.scroller}>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'normal'}}>  normal </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'notoserif'}}>  notoserif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif'}}>  sans-serif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-light'}}>  sans-serif-light </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-thin'}}>  sans-serif-thin </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-condensed'}}>  sans-serif-condensed </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'sans-serif-medium'}}>  sans-serif-medium </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'serif'}}>  serif </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'Roboto'}}>  Roboto </Text>
        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'monospace'}}>  monospace </Text>        
      </ScrollView>
    );
  }
}

AppRegistry.registerComponent('AndroidFonts', () => AndroidFonts);

")), mdx("h2", {

        flex: 1,

        <Text style={{fontFamily: 'Arial'}}>  Arial </Text>       
      </ScrollView>
    );
  }
}

group.title: MIGS VPC Payment integration in php
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we discuss how to integrate migs or vpc payment portal in php.

group.title: Manage dark mode without installing any package in react native

group.title: Always Use https url using Cloudflare
group.author: Infinitbility
group.excerpt: In this article, we can create page rules for force sites http to https using cloudflare.

authors.bio: Infinitbility is a tech blog created with the sole purpose of explaining complex tech in a simple and concise way thus creating value for budding developers out there.
authors.name: Infinitbility

authors.bio: Notebility is created as a platform to help, build and teach community of people who are willing to learn and grow. We aim to cover various IT Fields such as Design, Programming, Marketing and many more.
authors.name: Notebility

authors.bio: Here at Repairbility, we believe that the customer experience is the most important aspect of our business. Plain and simple, we're here for YOU. contact +91 9967814596
authors.name: Repairbility
